title: Books for Kids: Little Red Riding Hood New Version 2015 (Illustration Book)
description: Children will enjoy not only looking at the beautiful colored cartoon photos but children can practice their reading skills with this book. Beginning and early readers can enjoy hours of fun and entertainment. This story is great for a quick bedtime story and to be read aloud with friends and family.Your child will love this story full of imagination for children.The time honored tale of Little Red Riding Hood comes to life once again in this original retelling. author: Robot J.
